page.description: Adds a cookie to the response's cookie collection.
page.discussion: *[xb:Context.Response.AppendCookie(Cookie)]* adds a cookie to the response's cookie collection.
page.example: dim newCookie as System::Web::HttpCookie = new System::Web::HttpCookie(cookieName) newCookie.HttpOnly = .t. newCookie.Name = "CustomCookie" newCookie.Value = "This is the cookie's value." Context.Response.AppendCookie(newCookie)
